analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na niyyānikam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naakusalaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ naaniyyānikañca naabyākataṁ naaniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko
analyzed: na akusalam na aniyyānikam ca na abyākatam na aniyyānikam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyyānikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
